mapper.update: create database ${db_name}; insert into db_info(db_name) values (#{db_name});
drop database if exists ${db_name}; delete from db_info where db_name=#{db_name};
mapper.select: select * from db_info where db_name like concat('%',#{query_name},'%')
select tables from db_info where db_name=#{db_name};
